## -F platform_if_addenda.txt

## Simulation: Common header (do not touch) ################################

# Altera simulation libraries
-F sources_quartus_libs.txt

# Platform includes
platform_includes/platform_afu_top_config.vh
-F platform_includes/platform_if_addenda.txt
-F platform_includes/platform_if_includes.txt

# ASE CCIP emulator
-F sources_ase_server.txt

## Simulation: AFU-specific section ########################################

hw/rtl/lpbk1_RdRspRAM2PORT.v
